root: ^Yoo-hoo, Charlie dear! How are you? Thanks for the letter! Bruno's taste in books is marvelous, so I'm curious about what book he recommended to me...
^Whoa, he knows me well, I’m a romance girl through and through.

^I can’t wait to read it. Oh, by the way, could you bring a letter to Kai? I added some dried rosemary inside because I know how much he loves the smell. He’s been a little under the weather lately, so I thought some rosemary tea would be healthy for the old sailor.
^Charlie, you are the best! See you soon, dear!
